column5: Bethel Ranch is conveniently located on the northeast edge of the Dallas metro area. The property is one hour from Love and DFW airports. Just off the Highway 75 corridor, 25 minutes northeast of the Frisco/McKinney area. The lodge sits on a ridge in the middle of 82 acres overlooking the pond on the south edge of the property surrounded by open fields and timber. It is a quiet, secluded yet convenient location perfect for private gatherings or large events.
column8: Escape to the country at Bethel Ranch
